Osei Bonsu Amoah (amụrụ n'abali  iri n' ise nke  ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1961) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana na onye otu nzuko omeiwu nke asaa nke Republic nke anọ nke Ghana ma na-anọchite anya ndị Akwapim South Constituency na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ nke New Patriotic Party
A mụrụ Amoah na onwa  asato, abali iri n' ise nke afo 1961

O si Aburi, obodo dị na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke  mba Ghana. Ọ nọrọ afọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Prempeh College ma nweta nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na iwu na Mahadum nke Ghana na 1985. Na ulo akwukwo Ghana a na- amu maka iwu  ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke iwu na 1995.
A hoputara ya n'ime ndị omeiwu nke isii nke mba nke anọ nke Ghana na abali asaa nke onwa Jenụwarị  afo 2013 wee jee ozi ruo abali isii nke onwa  Jenụwarị 2017
Mgbe afọ anọ nke ọrụ gasịrị, a họpụtara ya ọzọ n'ime ndị omeiwu nke asaa nke mba nke anọ nke Ghana na 7 Jenụwarị 2017 mgbe ọ nwetara 52.78% nke votu ziri ezi na ntuli aka Ghana nke afọ 2016.
Tupu a họpụta ya n'ụlọ omeiwu, Amoah rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha nke ụtụ isi, IRS n'etiti 1988 na 1996
A họpụtara ya dị ka Enyemaka Pụrụ Iche, Ụlọ ọrụ nke Onye isi ala, ma jee ozi site na 2001 ruo 2005.
A họpụtara ya ozugbo dị ka osote Mịnịsta na Ministry of Education Youth and Sport, O  wee jee ozi site na 2005 ruo 2008.
Ọ na-akọwa dị ka Onye Kraịst, ọ lụrụ onye ọka iwu ibe ya nwere ụmụ atọ.
